features.description: System for sending automated email and text notifications for appointments, bookings, and business events

Multiple phone number support for multi-location businesses
Always show staff name in notifications toggle

features.description: Advanced automation system for creating personalized, triggered email and text message sequences based on client behavior and events

Complex filtering by staff, service, category, location, resource, appointment notes, dates, forms
Flow run frequency controls (every time, once per appointment, once per client, once per time period)
Flow deactivation with run cancellation options

Track effectiveness with goals and analytics

Business name, phone number, online booking link merge tags
Email subject line merge tag support

features.description: Capability to use form submissions and responses to trigger and customize automated flows
capabilities: Form field availability in flows toggle
Custom merge tags from form responses
Different flow paths based on form responses
Support for dropdown, multiple choice, choose one, toggle fields for flow branching
Support for email, phone, short answer, long answer, signature fields for completion checking
Unique naming for form fields in flows
user_benefits: Send personalized messages based on client responses
Automate follow-up based on form submissions
Create different client experiences based on preferences
Improve client engagement with relevant content

features.description: Credit-based pricing system for sending emails and text messages through automated flows
capabilities: Marketing credit requirement for flow messages
Text messages start at 10 credits (increases by 5 per segment)
Image support in texts (+20 credits for up to 5 images)
Message segment calculation (160 chars for basic text, 70 for Unicode/emoji)
Automatic flow run cancellation after 24 hours without credits
Merge tag character counting (15 chars each)

features.description: Advanced configuration options for automated messaging behavior
capabilities: Always show staff name in notifications toggle
user_benefits: Set up automatic responses for efficiency

features.description: Comprehensive reporting and analytics system for tracking automated flow performance
capabilities: Flow run statistics (currently running, canceled early, completed, total)
Marketing credit usage tracking (30-day and total)
Completion reason tracking (completed, goal reached, time expired)
